title: Software Engineer
details: Development work on the Soundtrap product. Did everything from new frontends in next.js to micro services in java, new features in a custom music studio in dart and data pipelines in python and scala on apache beam.
Here I worked extensively with A/B-testing and data-based product decisions.

title: Developer
details: Rewrote an internet bank, co-created/maintained a react component library and developed various micro services in java.
Co-headed an internal frontend forum and developed signing integrations to BankID.

title: Developer
details: I was developer #2 at this successful startup where I designed and developed numerous products such as Park46, a garage managing app, as well as Laddkoll and an administrative tool for garage owners.
I also helped coin the company name!

title: Freelance Developer
details: Short stint in freelancing where I collaborated with Sebton/Co to develop a web presence for SHHBostad. I also took on web development work for smaller clients.

title: Frontend Developer
details: Developed and maintained the official Swish website and helped develop a refresh of the app design. I also did prototyping work for Samsung and Elkjøp.

title: Frontend Developer
details: Frontend work in various marketing projects for clients such as Nike, Mabi and Machinegames. Developed the PS4 companion app for Wolfenstein: The New Order.
